FuncDef:
The dns server command configures an IP address for a DNS server.
The undo dns server command deletes the DNS server IP address. The dns server command configures an IP address for a DNS server. The undo dns server command deletes the DNS server IP address. By default, no DNS server IP address is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IP address of a DNS server.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the VPN instance of a DNS server.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. The VPN instance name cannot be _public_. The character string can contain spaces if it is enclosed with double quotation marks (").
